name: Skeleton's Only Night to Hang Out
name_original: Skeleton's Only Night to Hang Out
description:
Goal: Skeletize 3 humans without letting one reach you! 
  • You are a humble skeleton at the end of a hard week of clattering. You just want to hang out. But curious humans won't stop barging into your dungeon. Don't let them annihilate your buzz! Your goal is to skeletize 3 humans without letting one reach your room. (Bonus points for doing this in as few turns as possible)
How do I play your weird skeleton game?
  • Each turn you can try to cast fireball or skeletization, as well as which human you're targeting. Careful, as doing so lowers accuracy. You can also choose to take a necro nap and restore accuracy, but enemies will advance! If each room contains an enemy, you have the option to decimate the entire map at the cost of lowering your base level accuracy.
  • As for the controls??!!??(?) Just click the Dang buttons!
